attributes.action: pay a small amount towards your care in later life or like Scotland Nothing.
attributes.additional_details: My Elderly working class parents have worked all their life some of it being extremely tough.But because they have a small private pension and some hard earned savings they have to pay £400 pounds per week for care for my mother.Why are English people penalised for their care unlike Scotland and Wales.They would been better off on the dole all their life and then looked after for nothing.It seems as though Immigrants and people who have contributed nothing are better looked after than our own.
attributes.background:
Elderly in Scotland pay Nothing towards their care costs and the Welsh pay a smalll amount.
A person in England has to pay about £72000 This is wrong.
